vote.title: Authorize (1) an engineering services contract with Gresham Smith to provide design services to upgrade the five sets of conveyor moving walkways and one set of escalators for the Garages A&B Moving Walkways and Escalator Upgrade at Dallas Love Field; and (2) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $504,805.00 in the Aviation Construction Fund - Not to exceed $504,805.00 - Financing: Aviation Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) an engineering services contract with Gresham Smith to provide design services to upgrade the five sets of conveyor moving walkways and one set of escalators for the Garages A&B Moving Walkways and Escalator Upgrade at Dallas Love Field; and (2) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $504,805.00 in the Aviation Construction Fund - Not to exceed $504,805.00 - Financing: Aviation Construction Fund
